quote: Others help is only helpful when the main pillar of help is from yourself
History is evident; people have learned more by doing it than reading it
Trying different fields just taught me how much time I can save and be effective in one field, also saved me from regrets
You can't do everything, but you can do something
Mountain climbing is easier than mole climbing
Courage is in the first step; the rest is excitement
Learning by jumping in the pool is after 10th steps
Life is balancing safety and risk
Hard work is not just doing repetitive tasks, but also having the courage to try new things, only then there is growth; otherwise, you are in a loop
Implement good habits before they become compulsion
